Half-Brother

Positional boost, 69 GBP

Boost! is a positional boost pedal with a built-in loop. Stack your gain pedals between the loop in and out and, with the tap of a switch, choose whether you boost before or after your loop.

The Boost! offers unmatched versatility.

The Boost

The boost circuit is based on the ZVEX Super Hard On, an ultra-transparent boost that goes from clean to crunch in just a crackle. An LED indicates whether the boost is engaged.

The Switch & The Loop

The flipper switch enables you to choose where the boost is positioned, before or after any pedals you place in the loop. The position of the boost is indicated by a pair of LEDs.

Place a drive pedal into the loop and use the flipper switch to boost the volume, or boost into the drive pedal and drive it harder.

  • A limited first-edition batch of pedals are available to order
  • Lifetime guarantee and 14 day money-back if you're not happy with the tone

Set list length

We're capable of providing over three hours of entertainment, though we usually split this into two or three sets with short interludes between them.

When you book The Great Fire, we bring everything needed to put on a top-quality stage show; a high quality PA system to suit your venue, top quality instruments & equipment and stage lighting. We can be flexible about set-up and soundcheck times - we'll work with you to ensure everything goes as smoothly as possible.

Our favourite genres

80s Cover • 90s Cover • Pop • Rock • Christmas Songs • Crowd Pleasers • Hits • Dance • Emo • Naughties Covers • Soul • Motown • Funk • Blues • Country • Punk Rock • Classic Rock • Folk • Hip Hop • R&B • Progressive

Questions people ask cover bands

Can a band cover any song?

We pride ourselves on putting on a high-quality performance, but with enough notice - anything is possible. We have put together a varied and upbeat playlist that's guaranteed to get the party going, but if there's a particular song you'd like us to play then we'll do our best to accommodate it into our set.

How did you choose your name?

It's hard to come up with cover band name ideas. Some bands turn to a cover band name generator, but we chose our name as it was the first suggestion that everyone agreed on. The suggestion was based on one of our favourite acoustic duos, The Civil Wars.

What is a function band?

A function band is a group of musicians that play music for weddings, parties or events.

Cover band vs tribute band - what's the difference?

Where tribute bands focus on one artist, cover bands will put together a playlist of music from various artists. We pride ourselves on finding incredible songs and performing our own versions of them.
